mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, password, email, name, nickname, birth, profile_image_path, created_at, updated_at) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{birth}, #{profileImagePath}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{user.name}, nickname = #{user.nickname}, birth = #{user.birth}, profile_image_path = #{user.profileImagePath}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, password, email, name, nickname, birth, profile_image_path, created_at, updated_at from user WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
select id, user_id, password, email, name, nickname, birth, profile_image_path, created_at, updated_at from user WHERE email = #{email}
